Title IX (Gender Discrimination Legislation)
lead_paragraph: Fellow coaches were stunned by Pat Summitt’s diagnosis of dementia but hardly surprised that the Tennessee Lady Vols coach approached it in her signature way — head-on, open, and resolute.
snippet: Fellow coaches were stunned by Pat Summitt’s diagnosis of dementia but hardly surprised that the Tennessee Lady Vols coach approached it in her signature way — head-on, open, and resolute.
